CustomField.description: If File Download / View Type is "Private", only file owner, users with Modify All access on S3-File or users added in "Grantees" section will be able to view / download the file. So this section will allow you to configure users who will be default "Grantees" for files with File Download / View Type is Private.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If File Download / View Type is "Private", only file owner, users with Modify All access on S3-File or users added in "Grantees" section will be able to view / download the file. So this section will allow you to configure users who will be default "Grantees" for files with File Download / View Type is Private.
CustomField.label: Default Grantees for Private Files
